alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison; Marshall (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 12:08PM CDT until August 07 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marshall County in northeastern Alabama... Southwestern Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Central Madison County in north central Alabama... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 1208 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Huntsville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Redstone Arsenal, Moores Mill, Owens Cross Roads, Grant, Gurley, Woodville, Triana and Alabama A And M University. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
